page.title: 05A Day in Sarah Cobbe's Life
page.content: {Christleton.}It is about 7km from Dunham Hill School.When we get there we get off the coach and go to the changing rooms.There are 2 changing rooms,one for the boys and one for the girls.We get changed and then get in the pool and swim.We have 3 groups,an easy group,a middle group and a hard group.At about 20mts.to 2 we get out and get back on the coach.Then we go back to school.It's time for our afternoon playtime.We go back into School at 2.30. In the afternoon we sing.By the time we have sung every song,it is time to go home at half past three.I walk down with my cousin {Keith}only because{Michael}goes home at 3 o'clock.When I get home I play out until 4.35 and my Mum calls me in for my tea.My favourite tea is fish fingers and chips. I stay in then and watch the{Television. }
